text: Rex William Cowdry (born February 12, 1947 in Des Moines, Iowa"Rex William Cowdry." American Men & Women of Science: A Biographical Directory of Today's Leaders in Physical, Biological, and Related Sciences. Detroit: Gale, 2008. Gale Biography In Context. Web. 6 Apr. 2011.) is an American psychiatrist. He graduated from Yale University in 1968, where he was a member of Skull and Bones, and earned an MD and Master of Public Health from Harvard University in 1973. He was Acting Director of the National Institute of Mental Health from 1994 to 1996. He was the Executive Director of the Maryland Health Care Commission from 2005 to 2011.https://www.linkedin.com/pub/rex- cowdry/63/680/6a2 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Yale University alumni Category:Harvard Medical School alumni Category:American psychiatrists Category:Living people Category:Harvard School of Public Health alumni
title: Rex Cowdry
